full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SROG RLUNG GI BCOS SEMS KYI BDE BSKYED ZHES BYA BA DPAL LDAN ZUR MKHAR BA'I KHYAD CHOS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B SNGON CHAD MA GRAGS 'DIR BRJOD YOD MA YIN, ,GSAL ZHING TSEG BSDUS GO BDE RAG LDAN PAR, ,RANG LAS SKAL PA SMAN PA'I 'DON CHAD DU, ,GZHUNG MANG MTHONG BA DHARMA SV'A MIS BRIS, ,N+YA GRO'I SHING DANG DE YIS SA BON BZHIN, ,RGYU CHUNG 'BRAS BU CHE BAR RAB GRUB STE, ,'DIR 'BAD RNAM DKAR BSOD NAMS MTHA' YAS GANG, ,THOB PA DE NI SEMS CAN DON PHYIR BSNGO, ,AITHI,, THOR BU'I STOD 'TSANGS SROG LA RGOL, ,DE YIS SROG 'DZIN SBYOR BA NI, , AA LI TSER BI RUS RNYING SHA, ,RE MI TZITTA BUR DKAR SBYAR, ,PHYE MA RIL BU GANG YANG RUNG, ,SU RA RUS KHUS RLUNG DUS BTANG, ,PHAN YON DNGOS SU BDE BYED 'DI, ,LUS CAN BDE DANG LDAN PAR SHOG ,SHU BHA MASTU @005A *, ,SARBA DZA GA T'Am,,
